title: Development cess at 7% of the Land Rate (for FSI 1) for the BUA (excluding fungible compensatory area) to be constructed on Govt
clause_text: Development cess at 7% of the Land Rate (for FSI 1) for the BUA (excluding fungible compensatory area) to be constructed on Govt./Semi-Govt./Appropriate Authority’s shareof land as per ASR of the year of approval shall be paid to MCGM.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Development cess at 7% of the Land Rate (for FSI 1) for the BUA (excluding fungible compensatory area) to be constructed on Govt./Semi-Govt./Appropriate Authority’s shareof land as per ASR of the year
